programme.title: Yu Huiyeol's Sketchbook
programme.desc: Acclaimed musician Yu Huiyeol of the project group Toy is a familiar name to music lovers. This is where you can enjoy the energetic performances of talented musicians and their friendly conversations!(n)

programme.title: The Princess And The Matchmaker
programme.desc: Princess Songhwa refuses her fate to marry one of four suitors. Seo Do-yoon, skilled at interpreting marital harmony signs, is selected as the person to ascertain her best match.(n)

programme.title: Pegasus
programme.desc: Five years ago, veteran driver Zhang Chi was suspended for illegal racing. When he returns to the game, he finds himself starting all over again.(n)

programme.title: The Tag Along
programme.desc: After a funeral, a family is watching a trip video in which a weird-looking little girl in red is found tagging along the relative who passed away. But no one remembers seeing her anywhere during the trip.(n)

programme.title: The Vanished
programme.desc: The body of Yoon Seol Hee disappears at the National Institute of Scientific Investigation. Detective Woo Joong Shik seeks clues on her disappearance, while her husband Park Jin Han claims she is alive.(n)

programme.title: The Lady Improper
programme.desc: Ann is a repressed young lady whose psychological inability to consummate her marriage leads to divorce. But she undergoes seismic change after an encounter with a free-spirited chef.(n)

programme.title: The Lucky Guy
programme.desc: Stephen Chow is Sing, aka The Prince of Egg Tarts, a renowned lothario who treats dating girls as an art form. He meets his match when he runs across his first love Candy who's been waiting for years to exact revenge, not renew their romance!(n)

programme.title: See You Tomorrow
programme.desc: The story follows Chen Mo, a bar owner and 'ferryman' as he is slowly facing his own traumatic past whilst helping the people around him, including his co-partner Guan Chun, singer Ma Li and neighbour Xiao Yu.(n)

programme.title: Wish You Were Here
programme.desc: Yuan Yuan is one of the nation's reputable designers. She has the world at her fingertips, but she carries a secret that she cannot let go. A woman opens up a distant past that she's left behind in Hokkaido.(n)

programme.title: L For Love, L For Lies Too
programme.desc: Bo is an ordinary office lady. Her mother was a very famous singer and her sister has just started to become an idol singer. Comparing herself with her mother and sister, Bo feels upset to be ordinary.(n)

programme.title: Royal Tramp
programme.desc: After saving Chan, the leader of the Heaven and Earth society, Wai Siu Bo, a lecherous wimp, is made a member. Following a botched first assignment for the group, he is made a servant to the Emperor, the very person the Heaven and Earth society wants to overthrow.(n)

programme.title: Port Of Call
programme.desc: Jiamei Wang moved to Hong Kong two years ago. Desperate to become financially independent from her mother and stepfather, she ends up becoming a "compensated date". Chi-chung Ting, a truck driver, finds Jiamei online. They communicate via text message and become friends right away.(n)

programme.title: La Brassiere
programme.desc: A Hong Kong bra company breaks tradition by hiring two men, Johnny and Wayne, to design an "ultimate bra" in three months.(n)

programme.title: On Trial
programme.desc: Three young men are on the edge of losing direction of their future. Will the way ahead be a broad, bright road, or full of thistles and thorns?(n)

programme.title: Twenty
programme.desc: Freshly graduated from high school, best friends Chi Cho, Dong Woo and Kyung Jae have reached a crucial crossroads in their young lives. It's time to think about the future.(n)

programme.title: Lawyer Lawyer
programme.desc: Stephen Chow is Chan Mong Gut, an ace Chinese lawyer and merciless trickster who faces his biggest challenge when he has to leave China to defend a murderer in British-occupied Hong Kong! Making matters worse is the fact that the defendant is his former assistant Foon.(n)

programme.title: Godspeed
programme.desc: A Taiwanese drug mule has his foolproof smuggling method thrown out of whack when he catches a ride with the wrong cab driver, in this highly-entertaining caper starring Hong Kong comedy legend Michael Hui.(n)

programme.title: Ip Man The Final Fight
programme.desc: In post-war Hong Kong, legendary grandmaster Ip Man is reluctantly called into action once more. What begins as simple challenges from rival kungfu styles soon turn deadly, drawing him into the dark and dangerous underworld of the Triads.(n)

programme.title: Kamen Rider
programme.desc: Forty-five years since his transformation, Kamen returns to Japan once more to protect a girl who seems to be crucial to Shocker's plans to resurrect Ambassador Hell. Takeru Tenkuji, Kamen Rider Ghost, and Makoto Fukami, Kamen Rider Specter, join to help him.(n)

programme.title: Never Gone
programme.desc: High school students Su Yun Jin and Cheng Zheng fall in love, but eventually break up due to their differences. They meet again years later.(n)

programme.title: Grace
programme.desc: Ple's best friend, Care, is popular for being cute. Together, they create a Facebook page for Care to share her personal photos and videos. Grace, a former Internet idol, and Jack, Care's number one crazy fan, use Care's publicly available personal information to plot a kidnap plan.(n)

programme.title: Keep Calm And Be A Superstar
programme.desc: Zhu, from China, is a huge fan of Hong Kong cinema and has always dreamed of becoming a cop like in the movies. Unfortunately, he fails the fitness exam in China's Police Force selection because of asthma.(n)

programme.title: Brotherhood Of Blades 2
programme.desc: In the Ming dynasty of China, Shen Lian, a secret police of corrupt government, is trapped by the conspiracy on a mission. To prove his innocence, he seeks the truth with a girl called Bei Zhai.(n)

programme.title: Full Throttle
programme.desc: One of Hong Kong's top motorcycle racers is forced to reevaluate his entire way of life after a serious accident and the loss of a close friend.(n)

programme.title: A Day
programme.desc: A mystery drama revolving around a father who commits an unethical act to save his daughter's life. Three years later, his actions return to haunt him, trapping him in an endless time loop.(n)

programme.title: Lost In Time
programme.desc: Sui Wai lost her fiance Ah Man in a car accident. With the obligations of life sitting on her shoulders, she lives on only to find herself confiding in her beloved through a phone call. Dai Fai, a mini-bus driver who witnessed Ah Man's death, is always there offering her encouragement.(n)

programme.title: Double Tap
programme.desc: What begins as an innocuous entry into a gun competition eventually steers Rick towards a path of fatal rivalry. Four members of a G4 unit have been murdered; the suspects clear out any possible evidence. A top CID officer, Miu, narrows the suspect list down to Rick.(n)

programme.title: Blood Of Youth
programme.desc: At a Yuancheng orphanage, teenage brawler Su Ang is beaten to within an inch of his life by bully Da Gui for standing up for his girlfriend Lin Qiao, a fellow orphan. Later, Lin Qiao takes revenge on Da Gui by luring him to a rickety water tower.(n)

programme.title: Eye In The Sky
programme.desc: The surveillance team of the Crime Intelligence Unit comprises officers who are unremarkable in appearance. In the streets, they would pass you by unnoticed and unseen. They will not leave a mark.(n)

programme.title: Kick Ass Girls
programme.desc: Friends and owners of a boxing gym, Bo, Miu and TT, face different problems in life, friendships and love as they approach their 30s. Drawn by a lucrative prize, the three of them embark on an adventure in Malaysia where they fall into a trap set by a mysterious woman Zhuge.(n)

programme.title: Nina Wu
programme.desc: After eight years of scraping out a living performing in bit parts, Nina Wu has landed the lead role in a spy thriller set in the 60s. Under extreme pressure from the director, Nina starts to break.(n)

programme.title: Men Suddenly In Black
programme.desc: After their wives go to Thailand with her friends, Tin and his friends Cheung, Chao and Paul decide to grab this golden opportunity and enjoy 14 hours of freedom by putting their work aside and betraying their spouses.(n)

programme.title: Omotenashi
programme.desc: Jacky is the heir to a construction company in Taiwan. His father sends him to Kyoto to oversee the renovation of a hotel they had bought. Jacky goes to get back with his ex-girlfriend and to sell the hotel.(n)

programme.title: 72 Tenants Of Prosperity
programme.desc: Kung and Kin's rivalry goes way back to the 70s when they fought over the same girl Pinky. Now they run competing phone stores on Mongkok's busiest street. There's no mixing with the enemy in these parts, until Kung and Kin's kids fall for each other!(n)

programme.title: Seoul Raiders
programme.desc: Lam, a special agent of Japanese national security, teams up with JJ, a thief with a hidden agenda, to find a pair of plates used for the making of counterfeit US notes.(n)
Many women feel turning 30 years old is a big step in their lives. The ageing issue not just affects them in feeling tired and experiencing loss of energy, but also drives them to feel sad.(n)

programme.title: Go Lala Go 2
programme.desc: A new cast breathes new life into the oft-adapted story of a modern woman who must learn to balance work, life and love. Lala starts a new career after a company restructures. She encounters a handsome and successful client, Chen Feng, who proposes to Lala.(n)

programme.title: A Fool In Love, Love Like A Fool
programme.desc: Xiao-wei enjoys reading picture books written by his favourite author Kauff. One day he meets Blue, a mermaid. Since then, Xiao-wei's 'normal life' becomes not so 'normal'.(n)

programme.title: Murderer
programme.desc: Ling is a self-assured Police Chief Inspector who is investigating a cold-blooded serial murder case. However, due to the homicide attempt of a fellow inspector named Tai in which Ling emerged unscathed, colleagues are fast becoming aware of Ling's potential involvement.(n)

programme.title: Something In Blue
programme.desc: Four young people, one city. For love or ideals, with funny and faint bewilderment. An original improvisation in Chinese cinema, a brand-new rendering of city life.(n)

programme.title: Future Cops
programme.desc: In the year 2043, a notorious villain is about to be put on trial. His killers decide to go back 50 years by a time tunnel and look for the judge in his youth. They want to program the boy's mind and alternate his decision. However, the Future Cops follow.(n)

programme.title: The Legend Of Speed
programme.desc: Sky is a rebellious street racer whose brash behaviour makes him a prime candidate for a fall. He receives his comeuppance when a race against Fung results in tragedy. Exiled to Thailand, Sky meets his wayward father, who helps Sky reconnect to the philosophical side of his racing talent.(n)

programme.title: Never Said Goodbye
programme.desc: Jun Hao is a Korean young man who immigrated to Italy with his elder sister when he was little. He accidentally sees the weeping Xiaoyou who had quarreled with her father, and the girl leaves a deep impression on him. On the campus of Language College, Jun Hao meets Xiaoyou again.(n)

programme.title: Triangle
programme.desc: Small-timer Fei, his married buddy Sam and antique store owner Mok are all in desperate need of money. Fei wants his friend to drive a robbery getaway car but Sam backs out, throwing Fei in trouble with the triads.(n)

programme.title: Never Say Die
programme.desc: A male boxer switches bodies with the female reporter who exposed his bribes. Now they must help each other win the championship.(n)

programme.title: I Am Not Madame Bovary
programme.desc: In order to acquire the apartment they desire, Xuelian and her truck-driver husband conspire to get a "fake" divorce. Once the divorce goes through, however, Xuelian is shocked to discover that her husband has moved into the apartment with another woman.(n)

programme.title: Stained (Director's Cut)
programme.desc: Shek Jin's parents have gone missing, and the mass media has been conducting interviews about them.(n)

programme.title: The Road To Mandalay
programme.desc: A rundown truck barrels down the road, transporting its "illegal" human cargo under the cover of night. On board is Guo, a kind and honest young man who doesn't think of himself as an illegal immigrant.(n)

programme.title: The Farewell Girls
programme.desc: Three girls have been chasing their music dreams, but they keep failing until they met the owner of a funeral service company. They perform with a pair of funeral singers, but they do not get along well.(n)

programme.title: Missing ()
programme.desc: In 2005, a high-profile case of a police officer who disappeared during a forest hike spawned urban legends about the existence of a gateway into another world. Those legends are now adapted into an eerie supernatural thriller.(n)

programme.title: Wonder Mama
programme.desc: The effervescent Petrina "Bobo" Fung makes her return to the big screen in her first starring role in years as Lovely, a dutiful daughter and single mother who's pushing 50 and looking forward to retiring early from her librarian job.(n)

programme.title: Goodbye Mr. Loser
programme.desc: At the wedding of his former high-school crush Qiu Ya, unemployed musician Xia Luo is bitter about how successful his classmates have become and all that never was for him. The drunk Xia Luo hides in the bathroom and passes out. When he wakes up, he finds himself back in 1997 as a teenager.(n)

programme.title: La Lingerie
programme.desc: Miu, Donut, Celine and CC come from four different walks of life. Yet they always seem to hang out at the same place, a sexy lingerie shop where Donut works.(n)

programme.title: Seventy-Seven Days
programme.desc: Encouraged by Lan Tian, a steadfast girl in a wheelchair, Yang crosses the Qiang Tang dead zone.(n)

programme.title: A True Mob Story ()
programme.desc: Triad member Cheung Dee earns his living as a parking attendant. Fending off an ambush by a rival gang leader, Cheung Dee blinds the leader of the gang, Crazy Ball.(n)

programme.title: I Belonged To You
programme.desc: Based on the bestselling series of short stories by renowned Chinese writer Zhang Jiajia, I Belonged To You is a touching romantic tale revolving around two radio disc jockeys and the world they inhabit.(n)

programme.title: 49 Days
programme.desc: Medicine trader Shing Lau leads a team of eight, including himself, to venture from their homeland to the provincial capital. Unfortunately, a huge fire takes the lives of all his seven brothers.(n)

programme.title: David Loman 2
programme.desc: Comedian Zhu Ge Liang reprises his role as gang boss Loman who has since settled down to a more lawful life, running a guesthouse with wife Nana. However, things are no less peaceful with Loman welcoming gangsters into his guesthouse for free.(n)

programme.title: The Wrath
programme.desc: In the household of Lee Gyeong-jin, a high-ranking official of Joseon Kingdom, three sons die from an unidentified horror. A woman pregnant with a child of the third son soon learns of the evil spirit that haunts the house.(n)

programme.title: Tokyo Raiders
programme.desc: On the wedding day of Macy, her bridegroom Takahashi does not show up. Macy goes to Tokyo to look for him. She meets Tommy, an interior designer who wants to collect debt from Takahashi, and Lenny, a private eye who is hired by a gangster boss to spy on Takahashi.(n)

programme.title: The Unity Of Heroes
programme.desc: This film tells the story of master Huang Feihong's calm and sagacious characteristics, and the double worries of the provocation of Beiquan and the invasion of foreigners.(n)

programme.title: Painted Skin The Resurrection
programme.desc: Lacking a human heart, a demon cannot experience the true pains and passions of existence. There is a legend that if a pure human heart is freely offered to a demon, it can become a mortal.(n)

programme.title: Ace Of Sales
programme.desc: Sue takes on a sales job at a hypermarket. Her terrible promoting skill gains her atrocious sales and mocking from her senior, Mei. Fortunately, she meets a triad boss, Jack, who teaches her a sales technique that eventually transforms her.(n)

programme.title: My Egg Boy
programme.desc: A woman freezes her eggs and looks for the right man to start a family. In the pursuit of this man, she ends up in a wintry Swedish Province, where ice and snow become a metaphor for the unborn child who is waiting to be born.(n)

She gives birth to twins but due to familial pressure and superstition, she gives up one of them for adoption. Though life in the kampong is simple and hearty, it is also full of hardships and unexpected calamities.(n)

programme.title: The Sleep Curse
programme.desc: Lam Sik Ka is a professor at a prestigious medical school, and specialises in sleeping disorders. One day, his ex-girlfriend Monique reveals that her entire family suffers from insomnia and desperately asks for help.(n)

programme.title: A Man Called Hero

programme.title: Hill Of Ilha Verde

Wandering between dreams and reality, she visits her family members scattered in different parts of the city.(n)

programme.title: Triple Tap
programme.desc: Champion competitive marksman Ken comes across an armoured van robbery. He sees a policeman held hostage and shoots and kills four of the robbers. One of the robbers escapes. Soon after, Ken is attacked by the escaped robber Pang Tao.(n)

programme.title: The Golden Era
programme.desc: This film tells the life story of Xiao Hong, one of China's most famous essayists and novelists, who reflected progressive thinking not frequently seen during the 1930s.(n)

programme.title: Packages From Daddy
programme.desc: Nine-year-old Lan lives a peaceful and happy life with his parents and sister in a seaside town. His father suddenly passes away, and time stops for this family engulfed in grief. One day, Lan receives a mysterious package sent by his father before his death.(n)

programme.title: Ode To Time
programme.desc: After four decades, a group of veteran singers gather again. The songs they wrote when they were young once changed the fate of the island. However, time took away their youth and changed the island's soul. Can the innocent songs they sang back in the old days still relate to the new era?(n)

programme.title: The Return Of The Cuckoo
programme.desc: After Kwan Ho marries and migrates to America, Man Cho continues with his life in Macau. He is a busy tour guide and has developed a close bond with his mute friend Kiki.(n)

programme.title: 2 Young
programme.desc: A young boy from a working-class family and a bored young girl from a rich family fall in love. Soon, she gets pregnant, and the teenagers have to escape from their disapproving parents.(n)

programme.title: Long Long Time Ago 2

programme.title: Dearest Anita
programme.desc: Edith returns the abandoned items from Anita Mui's house to its original senders after the death of the famous Cantopop diva in 2003. The film revives five close fans' collective image and memory of Mui.(n)

programme.title: Three Against The World
programme.desc: Detective Andy Lau must protect a priceless copy of the Koran against the schemes of gunman Norman Tsui Siu-keung and thief Teddy Robin.(n)

programme.title: I Have A Date With Spring

programme.title: Happy Bigamist
programme.desc: Ah Sun's ex-wife Kong loses her last cent in business, and after going bankrupt is left without a place to stay. As she is entitled to own half of Ah Sun's house, she moves back. Ching, Sun's girlfriend, is determined to show who's the mistress.(n)

programme.title: Web Of Deception
programme.desc: Brigitte Lin is a blackmailed executive in this tense thriller. Suspects include Joey Wang, Pauline Wong and Elizabeth Lee.(n)

programme.title: Hong Kong
programme.desc: A woman narrates her personal story of the Japanese takeover of Hong Kong in 1941. She's Nam, a young and attractive daughter of a wealthy rice merchant.(n)

programme.title: Troublesome Night 2
programme.desc: Simon Lui, Louis Koo and Allen Ting are three DJs who undergo hauntings when various nasty events happen in their lives, making them spiritual targets.(n)

programme.title: The Royal Scoundrel
programme.desc: Beach Boy and Mrs. Chow have been partners in the police force for years. While investigating a case involving fake money, Beach Boy meets Ah Yuk, whose step-father was one of the criminals who had been arrested by him.(n)

programme.title: Dream Lovers
programme.desc: Chow Yun-Fat and Brigitte Lin discover they were lovers two millennia ago in this romance about the mysteries of reincarnation.(n)

programme.title: Rosa
programme.desc: Hsia and Lei Kung are two bumbling cops assigned to protect the gorgeous Rosa, girlfriend to a missing informer named Lee. But Rosa is wanted by more than just the law - the bad guys want her for leverage, and Lei Kung just wants her to be his girlfriend!(n)

However, thieves thwart their journey, sending them to take shelter at the ghostly Orchid Temple. There, Fong encounters Lotus, a female ghost at the evil bidding of the awakened Tree Devil.(n)

programme.title: Kawashima Yoshiko
programme.desc: Anita Mui stars as a princess who became a Japanese spy and played a pivotal role in the 1930s politics.(n)

programme.title: Couples, Couples, Couples
programme.desc: Office executive Mary wants to have children with her live-in lover, photographer John, but he has other ideas.(n)

programme.title: Inspector Pink Dragon
programme.desc: Nerdy Inspector Lawrence Cheng becomes the object of a scam involving heartthrob Rosamund Kwan and tycoon gangster Damian Lau.(n)

programme.title: Magnificent Warriors
programme.desc: Aviatrix Michelle Yeoh is a female Indiana Jones in an adventure that pits her and agent Derek Yee against the Japanese in 1938.(n)

programme.title: Fearless Hyena
programme.desc: One day, Lung discovers that Chi Hung was seriously wounded by Yen. Lung is very angry and fights with Yen and his subordinates.(n)

programme.title: Witch From Nepal
programme.desc: Chow Yun-Fat accidentally gains an antique that a witch from Nepal tries to claim back.(n)

programme.title: Shanghai Grand
programme.desc: An epic of old Shanghai with Leslie Cheung, a patriot, seeking revenge against the Japanese and Andy Lau, an up-and-coming gangster.(n)

programme.title: Aces Go Places II
programme.desc: Unfazed by their new popularity, King Kong and Kodojak continue to pal around, find romantic misadventures, annoy the returning Inspector "Hot Tongue" Ho, get framed for various crimes, and still regroup in time to rout the bad guys and save the day.(n)

programme.title: Wonder Women ()
programme.desc: An outrageous comedy about seven days in the life of two girls Leung and Ling, who want to skyrocket to the top by entering a beauty pageant.(n)

programme.title: All Night Long
programme.desc: This black comedy stars Dodo Cheng as a mousy teacher whose life is changed after an unwitting encounter with a corpse and $40 million.(n)

programme.title: Kung Hei Fat Choy
programme.desc: A classic Chinese New Year comedy starring Alan Tam as the money god who descends to earth to perform good deeds.(n)

programme.desc: Mainland policewoman Do Do Cheng is given a top-secret assignment to go to Hong Kong and look after the safety of an old Mr. Chien, a member of the Communist Party's Central Committee. Do Do finds herself in a plane, accompanied by her regular sidekick Cheung.(n)

programme.title: Story Of Kennedy Town

programme.title: Happy Together (Kennyb)

programme.title: Knockabout
programme.desc: Crook brothers Yipao and Taipao's tricks turn sour and scurry under Master Chia's wings. They encounter Fatty, a true master.(n)

programme.title: The Adventurers ()
programme.desc: As his parents are murdered by their good friend Ray , Andy is determined to take revenge for them when he grows up.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Fever

programme.desc: A corrupt Hong Kong cop flees to Tokyo. Two loyal cops, Ricky and Muscle, travel there to apprehend him, but Ricky is kidnapped. Muscle calls his supervisor to send help. The supervisor agrees and assembles five friends, who are either petty criminals or low-wage workers.(n)

programme.desc: Funnymen Eric Tsang and Anthony Chan play CIDs Woodpecker and Gold Finger. They are assigned to nail the nefarious gang boss Brother Shing. Unfortunately, cracks begin to show in their friendship one day when beautiful policewoman Gigi joins their team.(n)

programme.title: Love Unto Wastes
programme.desc: Chow is assigned to investigate a murder case. He discovers the complicated relationship among four suspects.(n)

programme.title: Honesty
programme.desc: A comic fairy tale about jaded club hostess Cecilia Cheung whose Prince Charming turns out to be innocent veterinarian Richie Jen.(n)

programme.title: Aces Go Places V
programme.desc: Two friends who own an investment firm turn to a policeman friend for help when they are framed for robbery by a gang of antiquities smugglers.(n)

programme.desc: Mou Yau and Siu Ling part ways because Yau performed a forbidden curse. After Mars is dead, Yau intends to leave Hong Kong. Shengmu decides to immerse Yau's destiny with joy.(n)

programme.title: Island Of Greed

programme.title: Silent Romance
programme.desc: A brilliant but undiscovered, disabled cartoonist is frustrated at his job, but he meets a nice girl and successfully expresses his love in his cartoons.(n)

programme.title: The Other Side Of Gentleman
programme.desc: Alan Tam falls for Brigitte Lin, not knowing she's merely using him for a psychological experiment conducted by her fiance.(n)

programme.title: Heart Of Dragon

So he persuades his loving wife, May, to embezzle a huge sum from work to save him. In order to repay the sum, they go to Thailand to seek help from Kin Seng's uncle but in vain.(n)

programme.title: The Young Master
programme.desc: Defeated in a Lion Dance competition, Dragon leaves the Red School in disgrace to look for his treacherous brother.(n)

programme.title: My Family
programme.desc: It's wacky family shenanigans with gynecologist dad Richard Ng, lawyer mom Bobo Fung and kids Lui Fong, May Lo and Pauline Kwan.(n)

programme.title: Wheels On Meals
programme.desc: Thomas and David are a couple of kung-fu fighting friends who run a fast food truck in sunny Spain. When a beautiful pickpocket named Sylvia runs off with their money, the buddies are drawn into a wild and wacky adventure!(n)

programme.title: Follow The Star
programme.desc: On one side of the track is Ah Sing, an uncouth garage repairman. And on the other side of the track is rich, young recording artiste Gayle. They should not meet, much less form some kind of partnership, but they do.(n)

programme.title: My Date With A Vampire
programme.desc: Bearing an unchangeable destiny, Mou Yau and Siu Ling will soon be up against a fight between them. Whoever wins will be the successor to the ghostbusting family. They promise whoever loses will take a willing path.(n)

programme.title: The Shootout
programme.desc: Jackie Chan produced this action thriller, with Aaron Kwok as a kung-fu cop involved in a daring heist at Hong Kong's Kai Tak Airport.(n)

programme.title: Swordsman
programme.desc: The Sunflower Scripture is suddenly stolen from the Forbidden City. In order to avoid any scandal, head eunuch Koo Jin-foo appoints Cho Leng-tsan to investigate.(n)

programme.desc: A fishery seeks court action against a local chemical factory for polluting the water. He employs his friend Wong to woo the fishery owner, Miss Yip, to convince her to settle out of court.(n)

programme.title: Spiritual Love
programme.desc: Pok is tough in appearance but tender in heart. Pok chances upon a letter from Butterfly who complains about her misfortunes. Pok falls in love with Butterfly, but falling in love with a ghost will only bring out sad memories.(n)

programme.desc: The No. 1 box office hit of 1977, Ducky is hired by Rich Chen to transport the "diamonds" he stole. Uncles Tough Guy and Mary would like to get the diamonds from Ducky, so they volunteer to relieve Ducky of his responsibility.(n)

programme.title: The Thirty Million Rush
programme.desc: Treasury employee Fatty discovers that bags of used Hong Kong dollars have not been incinerated due to a system error. Therefore, he hatches up a plot to grab the doe before they are burned. He seeks his friends Mark and Tomboy to help him with the heist.(n)

programme.title: Warriors Two
programme.desc: Hua stumbles upon a plot hatched by a businessman named Mo to take over the city of Fushan by killing its headman.(n)

programme.title: School On Fire

programme.title: Happy Din Don
programme.desc: A guitarist disguises himself as a woman and joins a girls' band on a tour to Thailand. He falls for the leading singer during the trip.(n)

programme.title: The Nobles

programme.title: Once A Thief
programme.desc: Three orphans are taken in by a wealthy crime boss. The trio grow up learning high-tech methods of theft and specialising in stealing treasured paintings.(n)

programme.title: The Big Boss

programme.title: My Date With A Vampire
programme.desc: Mou Yau makes Fuk Sang threaten Siu Ling in order to resuscitate Mars. Siu Ling gives the forbidden curse back to Mou Yau. They become reconciled. As they find out, the whole thing is manipulated by Shengmu.(n)

programme.desc: Due to detective Chan Ka Kui's unorthodox police work on the last case, he has been demoted to traffic duty, but the vengeful mobsters still have their sights on taking him down. However when terrorists threaten Hong Kong, Chan must track down the suspects.(n)

programme.title: The PrIVate Eyes
programme.desc: A small detective agency has problems staying in business, and out of trouble.(n)

programme.title: The Inspector Wears Skirts
programme.desc: Jackie Chan produced this female version of Police Academy, with cop Siblelle Hu heading an all-girl commando training camp.(n)

programme.title: Till We Meet Again
programme.desc: In World War II Shanghai, Tony Leung is torn between his duty to China and his love for nightclub singer Anita Mui.(n)

programme.title: Perfect Match()
programme.desc: Renowned conductor Koo Shu-lam is invited to perform in Hong Kong. While he is enjoying his glamorous moments, he also becomes the hunting target of two good-for-nothing kids, Philidonna and Jacky, who try to blackmail him.(n)

programme.title: Banana Cop

programme.desc: One dark night, Uncle Ming attempts to exorcise angry spirits in a haunted house but is unsuccessful and he narrowly escapes. He brings his two ghostly companions with him to a nearby town. The town is under attack by a group of bandits with supernatural powers.(n)

programme.title: I Love Maria
programme.desc: The Apollo Gang controls a giant robot to commit robbery. Al decides to leave the evil gang and is traced by fem-bot Maria.(n)

programme.title: Cop Busters

programme.title: New Journey To The West 8
programme.desc: The cast of New Journey To The West 7 returns with a new season of the series! Follow as they fulfill different missions and win dragon balls that make their dreams come true!(n)

programme.title: NCT World 2.0
programme.desc: This brand-new multiverse reality show features NCT members trapped in time and space within multiple dimensions in which they will have to go through various challenges to escape!(n)

programme.title: 100 Days My Prince
programme.desc: Prince Lee Yul falls off a cliff and nearly dies in an assassination attempt. Having lost his memory, he wanders for 100 days under a new identity. He then meets Hong Sim, head of a detective agency in Joseon.(n)

programme.title: 100 Days My Prince Finale

Each episode focuses on a different endearing and funny aspect of day-to-day life… from Celebrations to Fun in the Sun, Kids and Pets to Weddings, Hanging Around the House to A Walk on the Wild Side, Getting There is Half the Fun to Wild on the Water, The Games People Play to The World of the Weird and many, many more.(n)
